data.name: 晴天咖啡館Sunny Cafe-數位美術設定集
data.detailed_description: This is a collection of art settings for the text adventure game "Sunny Café".
data.about_the_game: This is a collection of art settings for the text adventure game "Sunny Café".
data.short_description: Want to know more about little secrets from the characters in "Sunny Café"? or want to know the secrets of making "Sunny Café"? The basic setting, art setting, and background setting in the game are all in this art setting collection! If you want to know more about "Sunny Café", don't miss it!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (32-bit and 64-bit) version 1809 or later, Windows 8, 8.1 (32-bit and 64-bit)†, Windows 7 SP1 (32-bit and 64-bit), or Windows Server - 2008 R2 (64-bit), 2012 (64-bit), 2012 R2 (64-bit)†, 2016 (64-bit), or 2019 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® or AMD processor; 1.5GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 screen resolution
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) version 1809 or later, Windows Server 2016 (64-bit), or Windows Server 2019 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® or AMD processor; 1.5GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080 screen resolution
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
